issue.title: Changes to simulation time to support pausing

content.raw: When not paused `Manager::UpdateSystems()` adds the time step to the current simulation time and updates the systems. When paused `Manager::UpdateSystems()` updates the systems, but the current simulation time is unchanged. A convenience method `bool Manager::IsPaused()` could be added for systems to check. This allows GUI / rendering / movement systems to update when paused, while systems like the physics system should check if the simulation is paused and skip the update.
